Name: Speedy Golf
About the game: Speedy Golf takes the precision of golf and makes it fast . Hit your tee shot, run after the ball, and collect powerups. Set a best time on each of the 9-hole courses. Don't get stuck in water hazards and sand, hop over them and hit good golf shots! Use powerups such as the Glider, Runaway Golf Cart, and Power Shot to take shortcuts. Laugh with your friends at the absurdity of playing a round of golf in minutes, taking every step from the first tee to the final green. Compete head to head with heart-racing finishes, or communicate in the alternate shot co-op mode Leap Frog. Feature Overview Hit golf shots and run after them. Use powerups to take shortcuts, or hinder your opponents! Play online up to 8 players, local up to 4 players Play Leap Frog mode, alternate shot co-op golf Play Career mode. Complete objectives, tournaments, and challenge rivals Upload your times to the leaderboard and challenge ghosts Collect and equip hats to suit your play style
